data.title: John Momoh – Lasgidi 90.1FM
data.text:
The Visitation Panel for the University of Lagos has started its investigation of the leadership crisis that rocked the institution. One of the first persons to appear before the Panel is the suspended Governing Council Chairman, WALE BABALAKIN, who refused to speak with newsmen after his meeting with the members Thursday afternoon, September 3, 2020. Professor OLAWATOYIN…

The Minister of Education, ADAMU ADAMU, has inaugurated the visitation panel for the leadership crisis in the University of Lagos. The inauguration of the panel comes a day after the Federal Government appointed JOHN MOMOH as Acting Chairman UNILAG Governing Council. The Education Minister charged members of the UNILAG Visitation Panel to do a good job as…

The University of Lagos now has a new Acting Chairman of its Governing Council, in the person of JOHN MOMOH. A letter from the Federal Ministry of Education, confirming MOMOH’s appointment, was signed by the Permanent Secretary, SONNY ECHONO. MOMOH is the founder of Channels Television and he replaces WALE BABALAKIN, who was asked to step down.…
